last_episode_to_air.name: A Plan Comes Together
last_episode_to_air.overview: The day of the car show arrives and it’s finally time for the Plastic Cup Boyz to unveil their finished build. Everyone is excited to see their ‘69 Camaro but is anyone excited enough to bid big?

name: Kevin Hart's Muscle Car Crew
overview: Kevin Hart and his closest friends are fish out of water as they dive head-first into America's dynamic and ever-changing car culture. Their goal: to transform from mere car enthusiasts into a legit car club.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Kevin Hart will offer a lighthearted look into the world of car collecting, as he and his crew aim to launch their own automotive club.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Kevin Hart will offer a lighthearted look into the world of car collecting, as he and his crew aim to launch their own automotive club.

episodes.name: Choose Your Builder, Wisely
episodes.overview: Kevin Hart and his Plastic Cup Boyz want to make their passion for cars legit, but they need a serious education about cars and car culture. They search for an builder and hire Lucky Costa. The Club decides to spend 20K on upgrading their cars.

episodes.name: The Need For Speed
episodes.overview: Kevin and the Boyz take their first educational field trip to the Irwindale Drag Strip, where they learn about power and engine boost from some experienced locals. Meanwhile, the new clubhouse location is revealed in the form of a cluttered storage unit.

episodes.name: Try and Catch Me
episodes.overview: The Boyz take a trip to Radford Racing School in Arizona, where they learn the driving techniques they need to handle speed and power. Spank and Lucky talk engine, interiors and paint, but budget gets in the way of Spank’s big dreams.

episodes.name: How Low Can You Go?
episodes.overview: A spirited discussion about stance and paint leads the Boyz to visit the Peterson Museum of Los Angeles to see the finest examples of color, chrome and other details. Then, the Boyz partake in a lowrider parade in one-of-kind cars.

episodes.name: Ripping Around the Track
episodes.overview: A visit to The Dockweiler VW Bug show gives Joey some ideas for his resto/mod. Kevin arranges for the Boyz to visit Irwindale Drift Track to learn from some champions how they make extreme use of brakes and suspension.

episodes.name: The Boyz Have Auction Fever
episodes.overview: The Boyz take their first trip to a live auction at Barrett-Jackson, where they get a taste of high-end cars and learn the various ways other builders make money in the car resto/mod business. Back at the Car Club, Kevin is unhappy with their progress.

episodes.name: No F's To Give
episodes.overview: Convening at the Clubhouse, the Boyz realize that they work better together and set off to achieve everything necessary for their official Car Club Launch. At Timeless Kustoms, Kevin sees his resto/mods in various states of build, and Harry and John get a taste of working at the highest resto/mod level.

episodes.name: A Car Club is Born!
episodes.overview: With car upgrades finished, the Boyz arrive at Boss' social media location to take iconic photos and launch them into the world. After a debate on who they want to be the Club's president, Kevin surprises everyone with a new goal for the group, as he unveils a rusted-out Camaro and proposes that they do a ground-up build together.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Kevin Hart will offer a lighthearted look into the world of car collecting, as he and his crew aim to launch their own automotive club.

episodes.name: Car Build Blues
episodes.overview: The Plastic Cup Boyz are back and it's time to get to work on their first build. They visit other car clubs to get inspired, then return home and decide who to hire to bring their dream build to life.

episodes.name: Atlanta Bound
episodes.overview: Kevin, Boss, and John visit Detroit Speed and see Kevin's latest build. In Atlanta, Harry and John dive into the world of Donks and G-Bodies. The PCBz make a strategic color choice for their build.

episodes.name: Go Big or Go Home
episodes.overview: The crew hits Magnaflow to learn about exhausts and choose a system for their ‘69 Camaro. As their signature build continues, the guys realize they need a way to attract buyers, so they plan a car show.

episodes.name: NASCAR and the Need for Speed
episodes.overview: The PCBz meet rising star Rajah Caruth and Warrick Scott, grandson of NASCAR’s first black racer Wendell Scott. Then they head to a real NASCAR track - but who will be brave enough to take the wheel?

episodes.name: We Rollin'
episodes.overview: The Boyz focus on their ‘69 Camaro build, working with Timeless Kustoms to install the supercharger, fuel tank, headers, and exhaust. Satisfied with the progress, they turn to their personal builds.

episodes.name: A Plan Comes Together
episodes.overview: The day of the car show arrives and it’s finally time for the Plastic Cup Boyz to unveil their finished build. Everyone is excited to see their ‘69 Camaro but is anyone excited enough to bid big?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Kevin Hart will offer a lighthearted look into the world of car collecting, as he and his crew aim to launch their own automotive club.
